name: Revenge Crystal Project
description:
❝Revenge and Correcting Old Sins
Come Together in One Entity❞

Revenge Crystal Project is an action RPG and Metrovina game with top-down view. The game world contains connected areas full of challenges, enemies and puzzles. You will play as an amnesiac knight  who must save the world and defeat the invaders.

[THE GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT, DEMO AVAILABLE] STORY:

In a darkened cell, an unknown knight wakes up after a long sleep, on a strange call commands him to end this nightmare. He has no memory of his past, and his body is affected by strange crystals. He starts his journey in a destroyed world under control of unknown invaders. He attempts to find out who he is and why he feels the need for revenge. During his journey filled with challenges and enemies everywhere, he will be forced to face his past secrets and the sins of his people, known as the "Crystallinez", who caused the destruction of several worlds.

NOTES:
  • Controller recommended.
  • Some Spells depend on the selected element type.
    • That means you can change the element of the spell and they will be changed damage type on enemies.
  • You can rotate the camera by activating it in Options.
AVAILABLE LANGUAGES:
  • Arabic
  • English
